snippet.title: Marble Age: Remastered - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The good old Marble Age is reborn as Marble Age: Remastered, and it's like a totally new game now! The Steam Page is open! A free demo version is available. 
Try it out and add the game to your wishlist if you liked it: https://store.steampowered.com/app/383740/Marble_Age_Remastered/ 

Join our social networks: 
Discord: https://discord.gg/E7x7C29 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ClarusVictoria 
Vkontakte: https://vk.com/clarusvictoria 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClarusVictoria 

And check out our new official website! 
https://clarusvictoria.com/
